Translations.Text: Allah ni we waremye ibiremwa bitari biriho, akazanabigarura (nyuma yo gupfa), hanyuma iwe ni ho muzasubizwa
N’igihe imperuka izabera, inkozi z’ibibi zizatakaza icyizere (cyo kurokoka)
Kandi ntibazagira abavugizi mu bigirwamana byabo, ndetse bazabyihakana
N’igihe imperuka izaba, icyo gihe (abantu) bazatandukana
Babandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, bazakirirwa mu busitani bishimye
Naho babandi bahakanye bakanahinyura amagambo yacu ndetse no kuzahura n’umunsi w’imperuka, abo bazajyanwa mu bihano (by’umuriro)
Bityo musingize Allah igihe mugeze nimugoroba [igihe cy’isengesho ry’umugoroba (Magharibi) n’irya nijoro (Isha-u)], ndetse n’igihe mugeze mu gitondo (igihe cy’isengesho rya mu gitondo)
Kandi ishimwe n’ikuzo byuzuye ni ibye mu birere no ku isi; (munamusingize) ku gicamunsi (igihe cy’isengesho rya Al Aswir) n’igihe mugeze mu gihe cy’amanywa (igihe cy’isengesho rya Adhuhur)
Akura ikizima mu kidafite ubuzima, akanambura ubuzima icyari kizima, ndetse agaha isi ubuzima nyuma yo gupfa kwayo (gukakara). Uko ni nako muzazurwa
